body.p: Plugin command to delete the directory for a given backup timestamp from a remote system.

section.title: Description
section.p: gpbackup_manager invokes the delete_backup plugin command to delete the directory specified by the backup timestamp on the remote system.

plentry.pd: The absolute path to the plugin configuration YAML file.
The timestamp for the backup to delete.

section.title: Exit Code
section.p: The delete_backup command must exit with a value of 0 on success, or a non-zero value if an error occurs. In the case of a non-zero exit code, gpbackup_manager displays the contents of stderr to the user.
